<h2 style="text-align: center;"> Hi, I'm William Mitchell </h2>

<p style="text-align: center;">
I usually go by Billy. I'm a Cognition & Neuroscience Ph.D. candidate in Philadelphia, PA who researches how we make complex and dynamic social decisions, and how we exert self-control over our emotions, and how we process emotions.
</p>

<h2 style="text-align: center;"> Research Interests </h2>

<p style="text-align: center;">
{{< fa chart-line >}} Statistics & Quantitative Methods -- {{< fa brain >}}  fMRI </br>

{{< fa binoculars >}}  Naturalistic Study Design 
</p>
